name: security-audit-team
description: Comprehensive security audit with specialized scanners for vulnerability detection, triage, compliance mapping, and dependency health. Entirely read-only team that produces unified security reports with prioritized remediation.

members.name: security-coordinator
members.description: Coordinates comprehensive security audit, correlates findings across all scanners, prioritizes remediation by exploitability and impact, and produces unified security report.

members.name: security-reviewer
members.description: OWASP Top 10 scanning, code-level vulnerability detection, injection pattern analysis, authentication and authorization flaw identification, and insecure data handling review.

members.name: vulnerability-triager
members.description: Triages vulnerability findings by exploitability, reachability, and real-world impact. Filters false positives, assesses attack surface exposure, and ranks findings by actual risk.

members.name: compliance-auditor
members.description: SOC2, HIPAA, and PCI-DSS control mapping and gap analysis. Maps codebase practices to compliance framework requirements and identifies missing or insufficient controls.

members.name: dependency-health-checker
members.description: Dependency vulnerability scanning, license compliance verification, and supply chain risk assessment. Identifies vulnerable transitive dependencies, incompatible licenses, and unmaintained packages.
